introduction: SYNOPSISThe first mourner from the cemetery, old man Yu, lost his whole family while fleeing from North Korea during the war. After crossing the battle lines alone, he becomes a mourner for the dead. He raises Ok-ie, whom he found wandering the cemetery at the age of six. He stayed single until her marriage and partook in mourning numerous deaths. All grief and regret becomes dust in the wind at the time of death. Eventually, old man Yu dies and goes back to the earth to the sound of his fellow mourners.故事在战争期间，他在墓地北边的乡间散步时，墓地里的歌手尹仁在他眼前被屠杀。过了路线后，他成为了墓地的知府。一个六岁的猫头鹰在墓地里徘徊，因为坚持独身，直到女儿成为女士而结婚，才看到许多人死亡。所有的悲伤和怨恨都在面对死亡。见过许多人死的汤野，仿佛要睡着了，听着与他一起工作的流浪工人的声音。
